mapper.insert: insert into membership_purchase (id, login_name, mobile, user_name, level, duration, amount, source, status, created_time) value(#{id}, #{loginName}, #{mobile}, #{userName}, #{level}, #{duration}, #{amount}, #{source}, #{status}, #{createdTime})
mapper.update: update membership_purchase set login_name = #{loginName}, mobile = #{mobile}, user_name = #{userName}, level = #{level}, duration = #{duration}, amount = #{amount}, source = #{source}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
